attributes.title: TERRIBLE TERRIBLE TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app is terrible I can’t believe they would think I would like trump smh😤.it takes for ever to download and then this dumb dumb app thought I would like trump NOOO I was looking for Bernie!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!.it also made  all of my instagram accounts into trump 2020 fan pages gross.it also hacked my WiFi 🤬🤬🤬🤬.the app made someone come to make house and take all of my my little ponies😤😭.trump also made made my husband sleep with the dog 😡😡😡😡😡.

attributes.title: Trash app
attributes.review: When I opened the app I died and went to hell and Spent 100 years down there respawned on Earth and I was 5 years younger.Moral of the story don’t download this app trash.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: You see I downloaded this app thinking it’s just an app for trump 2020 campaign.  When I opened the app server all pop-ups appeared advertising foot flavoured jelly.  I also got several calls from trump himself trying to make me come to the who’re house and eat the jelly off his feet.  I feel very uncomfortable with this app.  Please rate 1 star!!

attributes.title: I hate trump

attributes.title: worst app ever, would not recommend
attributes.review: after 14 hours, this app finally downloaded which was quite a pain because i wanted to have a first hand look at all the “wonderful” things our non racist president is doing and the content his administration is providing us. however it has done nothing but ruin my phone. it the short amount of time it has taken up the majority of storage on my phone. it is taking images from my camera roll and text messages without my approval. -61849172920/10 would not recommend for anyone. really disappointed donald, i expected more
I JUST DONT LIKE TRUMP AND NEVER WANNA SEE HIS FACE AGAIN.also Obama 2020😌
